SEARCH
Package hms.account

Class Administrator

java.lang.Object
hms.account.User
hms.account.Administrator
public class Administrator extends User
Represents an administrator in a system, extending the user functionalities. Administrators can be created, retrieved, and listed from a CSV data source.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    static List<Administrator>
    administrators
    A list of all administrators maintained in memory for quick access.

    • administrators

      public static List<Administrator> administrators
      A list of all administrators maintained in memory for quick access.

  • Constructor Details

    • Administrator

      public Administrator(String staffID, String name, String gender, int age)
      Constructs an Administrator with specified details.
      Parameters:
      staffID - The unique identifier of the staff member.
      name - The name of the administrator.
      gender - The gender of the administrator.
      age - The age of the administrator.

  • Method Details

    • fromCSV

      public static Administrator fromCSV(String data)
      Creates an Administrator instance from a CSV formatted string.
      Parameters:
      data - The comma-separated values string containing administrator data.
      Returns:
      The Administrator instance created from parsed CSV data.

    • getAdministrator

      public static Administrator getAdministrator()
      Lists all administrators and allows the user to select one.
      Returns:
      The selected Administrator, or null if an invalid choice is made.

    • updateAdministrators

      public static void updateAdministrators()
      Updates the list of administrators by reading from a CSV file.

    • getAdministrators

      public static List<Administrator> getAdministrators()
      Retrieves a list of all administrators, refreshing from a CSV file if the list is empty.
      Returns:
      A list of Administrator objects.
